snippet: An ad from a small new “super PAC” assails Senator Marco Rubio’s work to pass a comprehensive immigration reform bill in 2013 as an “amnesty scheme” and part of a pact with the so-called Group of Eight lawmakers and President Obama.
abstract: An ad from a small new “super PAC” assails Senator Marco Rubio’s work to pass a comprehensive immigration reform bill in 2013 as an “amnesty scheme” and part of a pact with the so-called Group of Eight lawmakers and President Obama.

headline.main: New Radio Ad Hammers Marco Rubio Over Immigration, on Ted Cruz’s Behalf
